title: 🎚 "If you knew how much work went into it, you wouldn't call it genius." - Michelangelo
content:
Given an integer array arr, sort the integers in arr in ascending order by the number of 1's in their binary representation and return the sorted array. Examples:

$ sortBits([0,1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8]) $ [0,1,2,4,8,3,5,6,7]
